long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RefinedTweets gives you control over the X / Twitter algorithm. I helps you grow, curate your feed, tweak the UI and so much more!

Now updated to work with X.com!

We are greatly influenced by the content we’re exposed to, but we have little to no control over it. RefinedTweets fixes that by giving you control. With RefinedTweets, you can set your own rules.

RefinedTweets does this by filtering tweets on various data points. For example, you can set filters to say:
- Show tweets only from people who are verified, or not verified
- Show tweets that have less than 20 replies
- Show tweets from people with less than 5K followers 
...and much more.
Growing your audience or getting rid of the noise — control provided by RefinedTweets will aid you goal.
Please visit our website to learn more: https://refinedtweets.com/


FEATURES

Tweet-based filters:
You can filter tweets based on its age, Favourites, Replies, Bookmarks, Retweets, Quote Tweets, Content of the tweets, or even Regex if you're that person. Example: Show Tweets that have less than 5 replies - great for discovering tweets that went under the radar. Or, Show Tweets that have more than 10 quote tweets - great for discovering tweets that are being talked about.

User-based filters:
You can filter tweets based on their users attributes. Supported data points includes number of Followers, Blue Verification, DM Status, Account age, Tweet count etc. Example: Show me tweets from people with less than 1K followers, or, show me tweets from verified users who has more than 5K tweets in total etc.

Block Promoted Tweets:
Refined Tweets helps you further remove the noise buy letting you block promoted tweets on your feed. This feature is available for both free and pro users.

UI Refinements:
Besides filtering out tweets, RefineTweets also lets you hide unnecessary parts from the Twitter UI to provide a cleaner and better user experience. For example, you can hide the impression/view-count if you're not interested in it. It also includes a special Minimal mode that provides a much cleaner feed experience.

Stats:
The Stat section provides you with some data to help you uncover insights about your Twitter usage. For now, it will show you the number of tweets filtered out by the rules you set, with so many more on the way.

All the UI refinement features, Stats and 1 filter (any) are free for users. No sign-up, registration, or credit card is required. You can support us by buying a license that’ll unlock the usage of multiple filters. RefinedTweets offers a lifetime license through a one-time payment that’ll give you access to all the current and future premium features, forever. Please check our website for more details: https://refinedtweets.com/


PRIVACY AND SECURITY

Your privacy is of topmost importance to us. All the processing by RefinedTweets happens locally in your browser. Your settings are safely stored in your browser. The only data sent to us is the product license to verify your purchase. None of your personal data is shared or sent anywhere.
